text: Habenaria fargesii is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China. The Latin specific epithet fargesii refers to the French missionary and amateur botanist Père Paul Guillaume Farges (1844–1912).Allen J. Coombes Janet Mohun (senior editor) == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Habenaria fargesii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Habenaria fargesii
